'''Overlooking View''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to reach the floating island "Dwelling in the Clouds" at the top of [[Qingyun Peak]].

==Trivia==
* The name {{Lang|"Overlooking View"|zh=俯瞰风景}} is a reference to the Japanese anime film ''{{w|The Garden of Sinners: Overlooking View}}''.
